name: Blazing Settlement
description:
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO DOWNLOAD!!!

This game is a combination of a city-builder and a puzzle game. Try to build enough buildings for your citizens, but be careful: Partly failure is inevitable and sometimes you even have to sacrifice some of your own achievements...

The game was made in around three days for the Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice. All assets, except sounds, were created by me.

Have fun ;)
